notes:
üì¢ Update: Stylish Action HUD v1.0.4.1

‚ú® New Features
* **Token Image Toggle:** Added an option to display the Token image instead of the character Portrait in the Action Menu.

üêõ Bug Fixes
* **[PF2e] Elemental Blast:** Fixed an issue where hit modifiers were incorrectly displayed as hardcoded debug values (+0/-4/-8).
* **[PF2e] Spell Slot Tracking:** Fixed a bug where spell slot tracking was not displaying correctly depending on the specific class data structure.
* **Free Mode Coordinates (Final Fix):** Fully resolved the (0,0) reset issue caused by data compatibility with legacy versions (pre-anchor system).

announcement.title: v1.0.4.1 Hotfix & New Feature
announcement.content: Fixed Elemental Blast modifiers, Spell Slot tracking, and Free Mode coordinate issues. Added Token Image option.
